entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Sharbot Lake

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: E 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers and flurries late this evening then to a few flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
